concept.title: Flume
concept.shortdesc: The Flume destination writes data to Flume.

conbody.p: When you configure a Flume destination, you can configure one or more Flume hosts to use, connection and batch information, and the client type used by Flume. You also define the data format of source data.

When you write data to Flume, you pass data to a source type. The Flume destination can write data to the following Flume source types:
Avro in failover mode
Avro in load balancing mode
Thrift
